title: FizzBuzz
description: A program to print numbers from 1 to 100, replacing multiples of 3 with Fizz, multiples of 5 with Buzz, and multiples of both with FizzBuzz
cmd: for i in {1..100}; do if [ $((i % 15)) -eq 0 ]; then echo FizzBuzz; elif [ $((i % 3)) -eq 0 ]; then echo Fizz; elif [ $((i % 5)) -eq 0 ]; then echo Buzz; else echo $i; fi; done
